credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
dimensions:
sheet: 11 x 8 1/2 in. (27.9 x 21.6 cm)
Other (envelope): 8.9 x 16.5 cm (3 1/2 x 6 1/2 in.)
title: Letter from Ira Glackens to Charles Prendergast (Labrador Farm/ Center Conway/ New Hampshire)
description: Letterhead: Labrador Farm/ Center Conway/ New Hampshire. One double sided sheet with an envelope. Envelope has same letterhead as letter. Letter pertains to Ira Glackens' acquisition of a Charles Prendergast panel.
